abstract.para: You must start the FreeRADIUS on the server after installation.

procedure.title: Starting FreeRADIUS
procedure.para: After the bootstrap is complete, start the server in debugging mode as a root user.
procedure.step:
To do this, run the following command:
Start the FreeRADIUS server in debugging mode only for testing. Other than for testing, use sudo systemctl start freeradius
